bio.p: Dr. Diaz, a biologist, is an adjunct researcher at the National Council for Scientific and Technical Researches (CONICET) and associate professor at the Instituto de Virología Dr. J. M. Vanella, Universidad Nacional de Córdoba, Argentina, where he is in charge of the Arbovirus Laboratory. His research interests include ecology and phylogeography of viral zoonoses and biological interactions among vectors, hosts, and viruses.
